title: Luther Songs and Score From Series 1, 2 and 3 - (2013 FLAC)
description:
This is a FLACMUX of the following audio CD: Luther: Song & Score From Series 1-3 (Music CD)

The content is a MUX, which means the audio streams are untouched, thus preserving the full, original quality of the content.

Content Synopsis:
Launched in 2010, Luther has fast become one of the BBC's most popular crime series with Idris Elba in the title role as a dedicated but obsessive police officer. With its mysterious theme, Paradise Circus by Massive Attack opening each episode the series also utilises a play-out track that fits the atmosphere of the story. 

Composer Paul Englishby provides the score for the series with music that can range from darkly menacing soundscapes to elegiac dreaminess. His career spans film, TV, theatre, dance and concert hall. He received an Emmy Award for his adroit jazz score to David Hare's TV production Page Eight (also Ivor Novello Award nominated). He also scored the acclaimed John Hurt, Quentin Crisp drama An Englishman In New York. Film highlights include An Education, Miss Pettigrew Lives For A Day and Magicians.

Always a favourite with the showÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s star and producers, it was considered for the opening theme song but they never managed to find a home for it throughout the three series. It is included here at Idris ElbaÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s request.
